amendment.description: To require the Inspector General to update an audit report concerning on-time performance of Amtrak.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3422 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 165.

action.text: Amendment SA 3422 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5240-5241; text: CR S5240) To require the Inspector General to update an audit report concerning on-time performance of Amtrak.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3422 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 3399.
